Message:
Several years passed,
and we were now called
the Witch Liberation Army...

It was then that Nebra,
who should’ve still
been at the church,
suddenly appeared before us...

She spouted nonsense about
making peace talks to finally
end the conflict between us...
There’s no way that would work!

Humans will never listen to witches.
That’s why we took up arms
in the first place...!

Yeah... It could never
be that simple.
Because, if it were,
then what have we been
fighting for all this time...?

“Witches and humans can
understand one another.
After all, that nun loved
us witches too, didn’t she?”

This time, as she said those words,
I couldn’t push her hand away.

The determination burning
in her eyes wouldn’t allow it.

But, to us witches,
this is our last stronghold.
We can’t possibly
surrender now...!
